pullrequest.title: Add countdown feature to common::Timer, expose countdown to TimerGUIPlugin

content.raw: I added a Timer unit test in b7be52a and noticed that there was a bug with stopping and starting the timer. The start time wasn't getting adjusted on stop, so starting the timer after stopping for a time would cause the time to "jump" forward (because it was measuring relative to the original start time). I fixed it in that commit. Let me know if you have any questions.
